column4: News;Kompong Speu: A young female  sugar cane worker
column5: died after she fell asleep in the cane fields and was cut up by a harvesting machine.------The  incident occurred on the afternoon of December 15 2018 at a sugar plantation in Kiev village
column8: Kampong Speu province.------According to source the victim was named Jet That
column13: Kampong Speu Province.------According to the source
column15: the victim went to rest in the sugar cane. After falling asleep
column16: she did not wake up when the cutting machine stated harvesting. The driver could not see her lying in the cane and the result was horrific.------After receiving news briefly on the afternoon of December 16
column17: the reporter asked Lieutenant General Sam Sammon
column19: for more details. He said he had not received any information
column20: as the Thpong district police chief had not reported it to him.------Warning
